events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has classified the issue as a refund request based on the keywords 'refund' and 'wrong item' from the customer message.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle this case for further investigation and resolution.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to proceed with the refund?
Here is the photo of the incorrect item I received and my order number is 123456. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and you will receive confirmation once it is complete.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the prompt refund process and look forward to the confirmation.
We have processed your refund and it should reflect in your account within a few days. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Checking in to ensure you have received the refund and everything is satisfactory with this resolution.
As we have not received any further inquiries, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback on the support experience you received in processing your refund.
